title: First Post: Simple Chart
text:
Hereâ€™s a simple chart rendered statically.

import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

df = pd.DataFrame({"x": range(10), "y": [v*v for v in range(10)]})
df.head()








x
y

plt.plot(df["x"], df["y"])
plt.title("y = x^2")
plt.xlabel("x"); plt.ylabel("y")
plt.show()
